About Me

Here are a few things to know about me...

BIO

The euphoria I have continuously experienced ever since I executed my first “hello world” program has been my motivation to pursue a career in software development. The pleasure of seeing it “run” as intended is why I continuously challenge myself to develop my skills and knowledge to be a better developer so that I can be able to make ever more complex and useful applications. I am forever intrigued by the notion of building a complex application that can change lives and transform the way people live whether it be for desktop, web or mobile. My current career goal is to become a valuable team member within the organisation and to grow my expertise and become a force to be reconned with in the software development space.
